snippet.title: THE iDOLM@STER SHINY FESTA Rhythmic Record - Universal - HD Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
THE iDOLM@STER SHINY FESTA Rhythmic Record by NamcoBandai Games Inc.

■□■Our diverse personalities will enchant you■□■
An easy idol master rhythm game! Feel the rhythm and liven up the music festival!

765 production's idols hold a music festival on this stage at a south island resort!
Have fun with the idols as a producer as if you were on vacation!
Add bands and animation to this conventional stage scene! Perhaps even performances?!
Backed by various music clips, with this rhythm game's simple controls enjoy new songs, animated songs, and famous songs.

The featured idols are IORI MINASE, YAYOI TAKATSUKI, AMI FUTAMI, MAMI FUTAMI, and HIBIKI GANAHA.

■Notice concerning supported devices■
□Supported devices□
iPhone 4S/iPhone 5/iPad 2/iPad (3rd and 4th generation)/iPad mini
※ Proper operation cannot be guaranteed for devices not listed above.
※ It can also be used on iPod touch (5th generation), however when downloading additional data you must use a Wi-Fi connection.
Thank you for your understanding.
※ Must have iOS5.0.1 or later.

■What is "THE iDOLM@STER"?■
"THE iDOLM@STER" is a game that debuted in Japan in 2005, in which the player acts as a producer for fresh faced girls belonging to the 765 Productions entertainment office, and ultimately aims to nurture a top idol.

Enjoy this world created with individual characters such as, cheerful girls, shy girls, quiet girls, temperamental girls, and mysterious girls.

■Animation■
Approximately 23 minutes of original animation "Music is a Friend", from the director Atsushi Nishigori, has been compiled!

■Other Packages■
We are currently also selling well-received separate packages for animation, featured idols, and song compilations!

□"THE iDOLM@STER SHINY FESTA　Harmonic Score"□
Featured idols: HARUKA AMAMI, CHIHAYA KISARAGI, AZUSA MIURA, and RITSUKO AKIZUKI
Animation: "Music in the World"

□"THE iDOLM@STER SHINY FESTA　Melodic Disc"□
Featured idols: MIKI HOSHII, YUKIHO HAGIWARA, MAKOTO KIKUCHI, and TAKANE SHIJOU
Animation: "Music of Love"

■Important Notice■
・ After downloading this application from the App Store, you can download additional data.
We recommend performing data downloads in a Wi-Fi environment.
Downloading may take some time depending on your connection.
The total size of the final application is approximately 3 GB.

・ This app cannot share save data with other packages.

・ We recommend playing this application with earphones or headphones.

・ Please visit the following link for questions regarding this application.
[Namco Bandai Games FAQ]
http://bnfaq.channel.or.jp/english/faq_list/557

■Languages■
Japanese/ English

(C)窪岡俊之
(C)2012 NAMCO BANDAI Games Inc.
(C)NBGI／PROJECT iM@S

iTunes Store Page:

https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/idolm-ster-shiny-festa-rhythmic/id581869945

Homepage:

http://bnfaq.channel.or.jp/english/
